Class Customer

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
Represents a customer in the flight booking system.

A Customer has personal details such as name, phone, age, address, passport information, disability status, email, date of birth, gender, and a list of bookings.

This class provides methods to add and cancel bookings, retrieve customer details in both short and long formats, and check if a customer has a booking on a specific flight.

Author:
ashok

      public Customer(int id, String name, String phone, int age, String address, String country, String passportNumber, LocalDate passportExpiryDate, boolean disabled, String email, LocalDate dob, String gender)
      Constructs a Customer with full details.
      Parameters:
      id - the customer ID
      name - the customer's name
      phone - the customer's phone number
      age - the customer's age
      address - the customer's address
      country - the customer's country
      passportNumber - the customer's passport number
      passportExpiryDate - the expiry date of the passport
      disabled - true if the customer has a disability, false otherwise
      email - the customer's email address
      dob - the customer's date of birth
      gender - the customer's gender

      public List<Booking> getBookings()

      Returns:
      the list of bookings

    • addBooking

      public void addBooking(Booking booking) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a booking to this customer.

      Throws a FlightBookingSystemException if the customer already has a booking for the same flight.

      Parameters:
      booking - the booking to add
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if a booking for the flight already exists

    • cancelBooking

      public void cancelBooking(Booking booking) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Cancels a booking for this customer.

      Throws a FlightBookingSystemException if the booking is not found.

      Parameters:
      booking - the booking to cancel
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if the booking is not found

    • getDetailsShort

      public String getDetailsShort()
      Returns a short formatted string with key customer details.
      Returns:
      a formatted string summarizing customer details

    • getDetailsLong

      public String getDetailsLong()
      Returns a detailed formatted string with all customer information and bookings.
      Returns:
      detailed customer information as a string

    • hasBooking

      public boolean hasBooking(Flight flight)
      Checks if the customer has a booking for the specified flight.
      Parameters:
      flight - the flight to check bookings for
      Returns:
      true if a booking exists for the flight, false otherwise
